Post.title: Ren'py (1)
Post._content:
{% cq %}
 python 
{% endcq %}

#### 1. 
ren'py  unicode `game/gui.rpy` 
```
## The font used for in-game text. 
define gui.default_font = ".ttf"

## The font used for character names.
define gui.name_font = ".ttf"

## The font used for out-of-game text.
define gui.interface_font = ".ttf"
```
 Zpix  github[Zpix-SolidZORO](https://github.com/SolidZORO/zpix-pixel-font)3000

<!--more-->

#### 2. 
 A-H  a-l  id  id `dialogue-<area>-<char>` 

```
#  string
$ flow = "hub"
#  string 
$ ch = 0
e ""
menu:
    "1":
        $ ch = 1
    "2":
        $ ch = 2
# flow 
jump expression flow + "%d" % ch
label hub1:
    " hub1"
    jump ending
label hub2:
    " hub2"
    jump ending
label ending:
    ""
```

#### 3. 
 `game/gui.rpy` 
```
## Calling gui.init resets the styles to sensible default values, and sets the
## width and height of the game.
init python:
    config.screen_width = 960
    config.screen_height = 540
    gui.init(960, 540)
```
 `gui.init(w,h)`  `config` 
 retina  
#### 4. 


#### 5. 
 alpha

Post.title: Transcription
Post._content:
>  Phon-Phon 

### IPA
**Q:  bilabial  plosive **
A: place of articulation  midsagittal manner of articulation 
**Q:  voiceless consonants **
A: 
<!--more-->
### Vowel Trapezium
**Q: **
A:  height of tongue frontness (i.e. )
**Q: **
A:  height frontness  roundedness
**Q:  diphthong **
A:  trapezium 
**Q:  diphthong ``,`o``i`,`ou`**
A: 

### English Transcription Tips
1. /r/``
2.  hiatuse.g. `l.n`
3.  glottal sound
4. /writer/  /rider/ ``  ``
5. /prays/  /r/  ``
6.  /l/-``
6. [IPA keyboard for all languages](http://ipa.typeit.org/full/)

Post.content:
Phon-Phon

IPA

Q: bilabial plosive
A: place of articulation midsagittal manner of articulation
Q: voiceless consonants
A:

Vowel Trapezium

Q:
A: height of tongue frontness (i.e. )
Q:
A: height frontness roundedness
Q: diphthong
A: trapezium
Q: diphthong ,oi,ou
A:

English Transcription Tips

  1. /r/
  2. hiatuse.g. l.n
  3. glottal sound
  4. /writer/ /rider/
  5. /prays/ /r/
  6. /l/-
  7. IPA keyboard for all languages

Post.title: Ren'py (2)
Post._content:
{% cq %}

{% endcq %}

 `.rpy` 

<!--more-->
```
init python:
    config.window_auto_hide.append("say")
    config.window_auto_hide.append("menu")
init:
    $ win_x = 0.5
    $ win_y_off = 1.5
    $ win_y_on = 0.95
    $ fade_time = 0.6
    $ win_alpha_off = 0.0
    $ win_alpha_on = 1.0

    transform say_fade:
        on show:
            alpha win_alpha_off
            xpos win_x
            ypos win_y_off
            ease fade_time alpha win_alpha_on ypos win_y_on
        on hide:
            alpha win_alpha_on
            xpos win_x
            ypos win_y_on
            ease fade_time alpha win_alpha_off ypos win_y_off
            pause fade_time

    screen say:

        # (side image)
        default side_image = None
        default two_window = False

        # 
        if not two_window:

            # 
            window at say_fade:
                id "window"
                #background "#FFFFFF"
                has vbox:
                    style "say_vbox"
                if who:
                    text who id "who"
                text what id "what"

        else:

            # 
            vbox:
                style "say_two_window_vbox"
                if who:
                    window:
                        style "say_who_window"
                        text who:
                            id "who"
                window at say_fade:
                    id "window"
                    has vbox:
                        style "say_vbox"
                    text what id "what"
                    
        # 
        if side_image:
            add side_image
        else:
            add SideImage() xalign 0.0 yalign 1.0

    screen input(prompt):
        style_prefix "input"
        window at say_fade:

            vbox:
                xpos gui.text_xpos
                xanchor gui.text_xalign
                ypos gui.text_ypos

                text prompt style "input_prompt"
                input id "input"
```
Post.raw:
---
title: Ren'py (2)
date: 2016-10-18 15:14
category: 
tags:
- ren'py
- 
---
{% cq %}

{% endcq %}

 `.rpy` 

<!--more-->
```
init python:
    config.window_auto_hide.append("say")
    config.window_auto_hide.append("menu")
init:
    $ win_x = 0.5
    $ win_y_off = 1.5
    $ win_y_on = 0.95
    $ fade_time = 0.6
    $ win_alpha_off = 0.0
    $ win_alpha_on = 1.0

    transform say_fade:
        on show:
            alpha win_alpha_off
            xpos win_x
            ypos win_y_off
            ease fade_time alpha win_alpha_on ypos win_y_on
        on hide:
            alpha win_alpha_on
            xpos win_x
            ypos win_y_on
            ease fade_time alpha win_alpha_off ypos win_y_off
            pause fade_time

    screen say:

        # (side image)
        default side_image = None
        default two_window = False

        # 
        if not two_window:

            # 
            window at say_fade:
                id "window"
                #background "#FFFFFF"
                has vbox:
                    style "say_vbox"
                if who:
                    text who id "who"
                text what id "what"

        else:

            # 
            vbox:
                style "say_two_window_vbox"
                if who:
                    window:
                        style "say_who_window"
                        text who:
                            id "who"
                window at say_fade:
                    id "window"
                    has vbox:
                        style "say_vbox"
                    text what id "what"
                    
        # 
        if side_image:
            add side_image
        else:
            add SideImage() xalign 0.0 yalign 1.0

    screen input(prompt):
        style_prefix "input"
        window at say_fade:

            vbox:
                xpos gui.text_xpos
                xanchor gui.text_xalign
                ypos gui.text_ypos

                text prompt style "input_prompt"
                input id "input"
```
Post.content: .rpy

Post.content:
• Praat

  1. F F1
  2. F1 F2F3 modal sound []
  3. 17.5cm[] F1 = 500Hz, F2 = 1500Hz, F3 = 2500Hz n F(n) = (2n 1)s/4L L = (2n - 1)s/F(n) s

  1. Praat
  2. New -> record mono save to list
  3. view and edit
  4. Formant -> show formants
  5. sel
  6. Query -> Get selection length
  7. Formant -> Get first formant F1 1-4

Praat[][] F1F2F3

F1F2F3

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)
